scripts.serve-nl: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 gulp bundle --custom-serve --locale=nl-nl && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --mode development --config ./fast-serve/webpack.js --env.env=dev
scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 gulp bundle --custom-serve && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack serve --mode development --config ./fast-serve/webpack.js --env dev
scripts.serve-loc: cross-env-shell NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 gulp bundle --custom-serve --locale=$SPFX_LOCALE && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --mode development --config ./fast-serve/webpack.js --env.env=dev
